nodes.text: Jeff Hoff authored the Dark Forces: Official Player's Guide, a strategy guide that went into depth about the video game Star Wars: Dark Forces. In addition to an expansion to the game's lore, the book also included scripts, concept art, and a section written by Hoff that detailed the game's production history. Hoff also wrote the Star Wars: Rebel Assault II Official Player's Guide, for the video game Star Wars: Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire.
